Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds great value for those who appreciate its quality and functionality. Given its worth to me, I am extending this opportunity to purchase it for $120. I believe this price reflects the value you would receive while also ensuring a fair return for my investment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
